title: This week’s top stories: Google Maps gains toll estimates, YouTube TV picks up Weather Channel, more
content:
In this week’s top stories: Google Maps begins showing toll estimates and fine road details, YouTube TV gains The Weather Channel and G4TV, Google Phone gains a Material You dialer, and more.

more…

The post This week’s top stories: Google Maps gains toll estimates, YouTube TV picks up Weather Channel, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
